excerpt: ACT Responsable is a french association created to identify and collect the best communications campaigns around the world in order to raise awareness on social and environmental issues (solidarity, environment, human rights and education). The aim was to redesign the french website by focusing on their actions which are exhibitions, schools interventions or even the NGâ€™Ad club.

title: Project 2
description:
Dark Mode

One of my last mobile projects before focusing on knowledge base tools at Help Scout involved figuring out a dark mode version of the app. Dark modes are easy in concept, but can prove a little challenging in getting right. I laid out the initial groundwork for what would be involved.

I created Help Scout Dark Mode (HSDM) to communicate this idea with the organization and engineers.

I viewed dark mode more as a set of principles to follow, ones that would follow the visual language dictated by its lighter counterpart. This in turn lent itself to creating a more functional vision, where I looked at how a dark mode would work from a hierarchical viewpoint, along with a color mapping study of light to dark.

title: Digital Art
description: Archived
excerpt: One of the things I did during the pandemic was to learn more about NFTs and how they work. NFTs are non-fungible tokens that can represent unique digital assets on a blockchain. I was fascinated by this concept and decided to create some digital artworks for my own NFT collection. I used various tools and techniques to express my creativity and vision through digital art.
